title: idk where to put this - honour related.
body: I get honoured n keys a lot in the games i play, statistically about 75% of games and i havent even got 1 checkpoint yet? can i request more info on how many honors are required per level/increment or something more than "have viewed your account and is close /not close to achieving, keep it up and you will get there" kinda replies. if its gonna take 5000honors to get to level 5 pls just be straight up about it.

replies.body: Like Periscope says, progress is variable by each individual which is where there's no specific time or number of honours to progress. Positive games will obviously progress you further than neutral games and you won't progress at all for negative games (a negative game doesn't have to result in a punishment), but it's also worth noting that progression will take longer this season than it did last, because we have the whole season to progress rather than only part of it.

You progress by at least being "not-unsportsmanlike" or at least a neutral player. Your progress is impeded if you are negative in your games. You will progress if you don't say anything. If you feel like you've been neutral - positive in most of your games, write a support ticket and inquire about why you aren't progressing. They may be able to point out why.
Not even Riot know how it works. People's honor levels fluctuate different to everyone elses who has made posts and no one knows why and riot never comments on it.
